location in uk: the location the flag appears is in the United Kingdom
location in california: the location the flag appears is in California, United States
flag in photo: a flag is visible in the photo
dog in photo: a dog is visible in the photo
close guess: either DougDoug or Neuro's guess is within 100km (62mi) of the marker
dead on guess: either DougDoug or Neuro's guess is within 25m (82ft) of the marker
sign with location name: a sign is visible in the photo which says the actual location name
